author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-490 Print the message in case of asynchronous deactivation
at INFO level instead of WARN level

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-490 Do not synchronously deactivate a component if it is currently
being activated. Instead schedule deactivation to prevent a deadlock.
